author: Al Jazeera
title: India joins coronavirus lockdown, WHO warns US: Live updates
description: India in 21-day lockdown, while WHO warns US's escalating outbreak could become next global epicentre for COVID-19.
content: India's 1.3 billion people have joined the global lockdown triggered by the coronavirus, as the World Health Organization (WHO) expressed concern at the acceleration of the pandemic in the United States and Italy recorded another large increase in deaths from… [+2595 chars]
